answers.answer: Sounds like you may have a serious circulation problem which can be caused by many things other than diabetes.  Please don't wait and see your doctor as soon as possible!

question: i have very cold feet all time even in socks. i do not have diabetes. now i havebig toes +3 small on each foot red purple color and so sore i can not touch or wear shoes..help 67 yrs female
title: red/purple very sore toes..also cold feet all time
